title: Matt Hancock – 2018 Speech to Royal College of Nursing
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by Matt Hancock, the Secretary of State for Health and Social Care, at the Royal College of Nursing on 31 October 2018.

[![](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2015/12/matthancock2-1.jpg)](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2015/12/matthancock2-1.jpg)

This isn’t about penalising people, but identifying which trusts need support to reduce violence against staff, whether that’s by better building design or improved procedures.
